name: SelfIdentifiedNeedForContraceptionSINC
title: Self Identified Need for Contraception (SINC)
description:
Related to SINC as defined in LOINC - 98076-3
Do you want to talk about contraception or pregnancy prevention during your visit today
purpose: (Clinical Focus: The self-identified need for contraception data element was identified at the Person-Centered Reproductive Health Center at UCSF and is intended to capture the contraceptive needs of people as they themselves define it.),(Data Element Scope: SINC captures the contraceptive needs of individuals as they themselves define those needs at the point of care.),(Inclusion Criteria: People desiring contraception or pregnancy prevention who are aged 15-44),(Exclusion Criteria: )
